opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with unlawful possession of dangerous drugs and narcotics. Before BODLEY, J., without a jury. Appeal, No. 6, Oct. T., 1974, from judgment of sentence of Court of Common Pleas of Bucks County, Nos. 1929/1, 1929/2, and 1929/3 of 1970.
opinion.attorneys: Nino V. Tinari, for appellant; Martin J. King, Deputy District Attorney, Stephen B. Harris, First Assistant District Attorney, and Kenneth G. Biehn, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
